nodes.text: Jayx was a male Human who served as a security officer in the Chibias concert hall.
Shortly after the Battle of Endor, Jayx and Tomin, a fellow security officer, arrested Zakarisz Ghent in the Chibias concert hall. The two were following the orders of Counselor Raines.
They were attacked by Emperor's Hand Mara Jade when she rescued the young slicer. Jayx was stunned during the confrontation.
